title: Efforts made, challenges faced, and recommendations provided by stakeholders involved in mpox prevention and control in China: a qualitative study
content:
Publication date: November 2024

Source: Public Health, Volume 236

Author(s): Weijie Zhang, Xiao Qi, Baihui Han, Leiwen Fu, Bingyi Wang, Ke Wu, Zhongsi Hong, Liuqing Yang, Jinbo He, Ye Zhang, Yinghui Sun, Yuanyi Chen, Siyang Liu, Longtao He, Fan Lv, Jun Qian, Sitong Luo, Xiaojun Meng, Huachun Zou
